snippet: Pope Benedict XVI’s decision to resign has puzzled the faithful and scholars, who wonder how a pope can be infallible one day and fallible again the next.
abstract: Vatican City Memo; Pope Benedict XVI’s decision to resign has puzzled faithful and scholars, who wonder whether he will lose his infallibility as result of stepping down and if transformation might undermine authority of church teaching.
lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI’s decision to resign has puzzled the faithful and scholars, who wonder how a pope can be infallible one day and fallible again the next.

headline.seo: What Do You Call a Retired Pope? And Is He Still Infallible?
headline.main: When a Pope Retires, Is He Still Infallible?
headline.print_headline: When a Pope Retires, Is He Still Infallible?
